ComicInfo.Summary: Zack, now is possession of a Geldarian Tech Jacket, attempts to return to his every day life. He finds it makes some things easier while it makes others much more difficult, such as maintaining a normal life. All seems to be going well until The Geldarians learn that he has the Jacket. They must uphold an ancient law, which states that any non-Geldarian to wield a Tech Jacket must be put to death. This puts a damper on Zack's plans for Saturday night.
